checkCollisionBottom() - Method in class edu.uoc.uocanoid.controller.GameController
It checks if the ball exceeds the paddle's y.
If the ball exceeds the paddle's y, then the player must lose one life.
checkCollisionBricks() - Method in class edu.uoc.uocanoid.controller.GameController
For each brick which is alive in the level, it checks if the ball is in its range.
checkCollisionPaddle() - Method in class edu.uoc.uocanoid.controller.GameController
It checks if the ball is in paddle's range.
checkCollisionScene() - Method in class edu.uoc.uocanoid.controller.GameController
It checks if the ball exceeds the stage (right, left or top).

getBallData() - Method in class edu.uoc.uocanoid.controller.GameController
It returns, as a Map, the values of the following ball's attributes of the current level:
x y radius xDirection yDirection speed With the object that is returned, it is possible to do: obj.get("x") and retrieve the value of the ball's x.

Main method
Main - Class in edu.uoc.uocanoid
Special wrapper class that is created because JAR files do not allow us to use a main method that is in a Class that extends from Application.

This class is used as entry point of a JAR file created by us.

toString() - Method in class edu.uoc.uocanoid.model.ball.Ball
Format: "position: (x,y), size: widthxheight, direction: (xDirection,yDirection), speed: speed"
Example: "position: (10,20), size: 8x6, direction: (RIGHT,UP), speed: 2"
